column4: I'm trying to compile the latest nvidia driver for X, but it hates me
it thinks the kernel sources aren't where they are
because the other nvidia drivers dont work for me
this is the onliner i used for my card "sudo apt-get install linux-restricted-modules-$(uname -r) linux-restricted-modules-common nvidia-glx-new nvidia-kernel-common" I have a 6600gt nvidia
